mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREEBOARD(TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER_ID) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{WRITER_ID} )
mapper.update: UPDATE FREEBOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, MODDATE = #{moddate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT f.ID, f.TITLE, f.CONTENT, f.WRITER_ID, m.NICKNAME, f.REGDATE, f.MODDATE, f.CNT FROM FREEBOARD f JOIN MEMBER m ON f.WRITER_ID = m.ID
